name: nvim-latest
description: Installs the latest nvim binaries to /opt/vim

plugins.description: A comma separated list of neovim plugin urls, to be installed as the contianerUser. This feature will NOT installed system dependencies of the plugins. For example, the base-language-server LSP requires nodejs. You will need to install plugin system depedendencies prior to running this feature. This feature does not install any by default.
